bump.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: to hit or knock against something
bump.translation[0].definitions[0].examp: The roof was so low he bumped his head (=his head hit the roof).
I ran after him, bumping against people in my hurry.
Tim was a clumsy boy, always bumping into the furniture.
She bumped her arm on the table.
bump.translation[0].definitions[1].defin: to move up and down as you move forward, especially in a vehicle
bump.translation[0].definitions[1].examp: A police car bumped down the track.
The plane was bumping along the runway.
bump.translation[0].definitions[2].defin: to push or pull something somewhere in an irregular or unsteady way
bump.translation[0].definitions[2].examp: Flora was bumping her bags down the steps.
bump.translation[0].definitions[3].defin: to move someone or something into a different class or group, or to remove them from a class or group altogether
bump.translation[0].definitions[3].examp: The flight was overbooked, and Dad was the first one to be bumped.
The reforms bumped many families off the state-provided health care list.
bump somebody up to/out of/from etc something
bump.translation[0].definitions[4].defin: to move a radio or television programme to a different time
bump.translation[0].definitions[4].examp: ‘Married with Children’ will be bumped from Sundays to Saturdays.
bump.translation[1].definitions[0].defin: an area of skin that is raised because you have hit it on something
bump.translation[1].definitions[0].examp: She has a bump on the back of her head.
He had a few injuries, mostly bumps and bruises.
bump.translation[1].definitions[1].defin: a small raised area on a surface
bump.translation[1].definitions[1].examp: The car hit a bump on the road.
bump.translation[1].definitions[2].defin: the sound or sudden movement of something hitting a hard surface
bump.translation[1].definitions[2].examp: We heard a bump in the next room.
Rose fell, landing with a bump.
fall/sit down etc with a bump
bump.translation[1].definitions[3].defin: a small accident in which your car hits something but you are not hurt
